description: This class represents equivalent injections (generation or load).  Voltage regulation is allowed only at the point of connection.

contents.name: ReactiveCapabilityCurve
contents.description: The equivalent injection using this reactive capability curve.

contents.name: maxP
contents.description: Maximum active power of the injection.

contents.name: maxQ
contents.description: Used for modeling of infeed for load flow exchange. Not used for short circuit modeling.  If maxQ and minQ are not used ReactiveCapabilityCurve can be used.

contents.name: minP
contents.description: Minimum active power of the injection.

contents.name: minQ
contents.description: Used for modeling of infeed for load flow exchange. Not used for short circuit modeling.  If maxQ and minQ are not used ReactiveCapabilityCurve can be used.

contents.name: p
contents.description:
Equivalent active power injection. Load sign convention is used, i.e. positive sign means flow out from a node.
Starting value for steady state solutions.

contents.name: q
contents.description:
Equivalent reactive power injection. Load sign convention is used, i.e. positive sign means flow out from a node.
Starting value for steady state solutions.

contents.name: r
contents.description:
Positive sequence resistance. Used to represent Extended-Ward (IEC 60909).
Usage : Extended-Ward is a result of network reduction prior to the data exchange.

contents.name: r0
contents.description:
Zero sequence resistance. Used to represent Extended-Ward (IEC 60909).
Usage : Extended-Ward is a result of network reduction prior to the data exchange.

contents.name: r2
contents.description:
Negative sequence resistance. Used to represent Extended-Ward (IEC 60909).
Usage : Extended-Ward is a result of network reduction prior to the data exchange.

contents.name: regulationCapability
contents.description: Specifies whether or not the EquivalentInjection has the capability to regulate the local voltage.

contents.name: regulationStatus
contents.description: Specifies the default regulation status of the EquivalentInjection.  True is regulating.  False is not regulating.

contents.name: regulationTarget
contents.description: The target voltage for voltage regulation.

contents.name: x
contents.description:
Positive sequence reactance. Used to represent Extended-Ward (IEC 60909).
Usage : Extended-Ward is a result of network reduction prior to the data exchange.

contents.name: x0
contents.description:
Zero sequence reactance. Used to represent Extended-Ward (IEC 60909).
Usage : Extended-Ward is a result of network reduction prior to the data exchange.

contents.name: x2
contents.description:
Negative sequence reactance. Used to represent Extended-Ward (IEC 60909).
Usage : Extended-Ward is a result of network reduction prior to the data exchange.
